TopicTitle: How do I reinstall Breaking Grounds after a new installation of Kerbal Space Program?

Articles.Content: I have purchased Breaking Grounds, but have recently gotten a new installation of KSP, and I need to reinstall Breaking Grounds. Does anyone know how to do this using Steam?
i'm.. not a computer geek, but maybe try clicking on the gear icon on ksp , when your on steam, go into properties, go to local files, and click "Verify Integrity of Game Files."

Hello, @Catflier126 -

No problem helping you install the DLC.
